name: raycast-extension-template
title: Raycast Extension Template
description: A template for creating Raycast extensions on Windows with example commands and utilities.
author: your-raycast-username

preferences.name: sharexPath
preferences.title: ShareX Executable Path
preferences.description: Optional. If auto-detect fails, provide the full path to ShareX.exe (supports %ENV% variables).

commands.name: example-command
commands.title: Example Command
commands.description: Shows how to create a basic detail view with actions

commands.name: list-command
commands.title: List Command Example
commands.description: Demonstrates list view with search and system integration

commands.name: sharex-open-main
commands.title: ShareX: Open Main Window
commands.description: Open ShareX main window (uses preference override if set)

commands.name: sharex-show-path
commands.title: ShareX: Show Detected Path
commands.description: Display detected ShareX.exe path and copy to clipboard

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
